sys_hub_flow.description: This flow would email the approver notifying about expenses requests, and the requestor about their submission as well as the status of their request.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update the approval field to rejected
Send email to requestor that their request has been denied

sys_element_mapping.value:
Please, do not reply to this email. This is an automated response. For further assistance please contact us through our PayNow application.

 

Dear Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Opened by,

Your expense request for the following dates:  Trigger➛...➛Expense Start Date to Trigger➛...➛Expense End Datefor the amount of Trigger➛...➛Total Authorized Amount has been rejected. Please, contact your manager for more information. We apologize for the inconvenience.

 

Best regards,

Your PayNow Team

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update the approval field to approval
Send the requestor an email notifying about their request being sent for approval

sys_element_mapping.value:
Please, do not reply to this email. This is an automated response. For further assistance please contact us through our PayNow application.

 

Dear Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Opened by,

Your expense request for the following dates:  Trigger➛...➛Expense Start Date to Trigger➛...➛Expense End Datefor the amount of Trigger➛...➛Total Authorized Amount has been submitted, and it is awaiting approval. You will be notified as soon as the status is updated. Thank you for your patience 

 

Best regards,

Your PayNow Team

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update the approval field to approved
Send an email to the requestor notifying about their request being approved

sys_element_mapping.value:
Please, do not reply to this email. This is an automated response. For further assistance, please contact us through our PayNow application.

 

Dear Trigger➛...➛Opened by,

Your expense request for the following dates:  Trigger➛...➛Expense Start Date to Trigger➛...➛Expense End Datefor the amount of Trigger➛...➛Total Authorized Amount has been automatically approved due to the level of emergency. This preset amount has been on activated on your credit card. Safe travels!

 

Best regards,

Your PayNow Team

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update the approval field to approved
If priotity is !=1 and approved, send the requestor an email notifying of approval

sys_element_mapping.value:
Please, do not reply to this email. This is an automated response. For further assistance please contact us through our PayNow application.

 

Dear Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Opened by,

Your expense request for the following dates:  Trigger➛...➛Expense Start Date to Trigger➛...➛Expense End Datefor the amount of Trigger➛...➛Total Authorized Amount has been approved. This preset amount has been on activated on your credit card. Safe travels!

 

Best regards,

Your PayNow Team

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send an email to assigment group to approve a newly created expense request

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger➛...➛Name, 
 
The following expense request Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Number has been submitted, and it has been automatically approved due to the level of urgency. Please, revise this record for more information. Thank you!

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: If priority !=1 and it is denied, send requestos email notifying of request denial
If the request not an emergency send it to the manager for approval
Automatically approve the request for emergency requests
